website_summaries.verdict: Adorable and well-made candy corn, bat, and pumpkin Pusheen keychains are just some of the not-so-spooky plushies you may find in these premium blind boxes.
pros: Equal chance to find each toy
Chubby, but not too large for a keychain
cons: A little small for the price

customer_reviews.title: Adorable surprise boxes
customer_reviews.text: We purchased three of these Halloween surprise boxes. My son loved the bat and we all said awweee and marveled at the candy corn Pusheen for 5 minutes straight. Then my daughter and I fought over it. I won but I noticed it’s on her nightstand now so I guess I lost! Touché! These are cute and nice as backpack charms. The price seems a tad high on these to me in general but once you get them the cuteness negates the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mieshka

customer_reviews.title: How terrible is it
customer_reviews.text: I got three same pusheen cats. How terrible is it. Okay. I changed my mind. Damn it. They are so adorable I couldn't hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorably Spooky!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely adorable! I love them! I ordered two of these and got the Frankensheen and Mummysheen. These are my first miniatures but I absolutely love them and can't stop cooing over them. They come with a little ball keychain attached and are just too cute. If you are a fan or collector of Pusheen I definitely recommend you grabbing these blind boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Seraphia

customer_reviews.title: Great item for Pusheen fan's!
customer_reviews.text: Love these blind boxes! My sister is a huge Pusheen fan so I purchased this for her as a surprise. She received the Frankenstein Pusheen which is so cute! I will likely buy her another one of these before Halloween. Great quality and so cute, worth the $10!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite Christmas ornaments :)
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter and I love Halloween. I didn’t discover these until after Halloween and she wanted them for Christmas. We have purchased 5 now and each one has been different. They are adorable and well made. The ghost and bat are my favorite. We hope to get the entire set! They are hanging on our Christmas tree. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jo Momma

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, I like the designs, they are all so nice! A lot of the time when you have a series of blind boxes they have two good ones and the others are all kinda lame and you have to buy a lot of them to get the good ones. These however, are all designed to be really cute and nice. I have two of them, I got the little purple one holding a pumpkin and also the zombie! They are both so soft and squishy, the stuffing feels really firm and they're cute moral support for when you're feeling a little stressed out, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Familia Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I got this and told my boyfriend about it and even he was excited to see what I got! I ended up getting Bat Cat (not an official name, just what I've been referring to it as :P) which was one of the ones I was really hoping for. The quality of these are amazing and they're so soft! I definitely plan on buying more of the halloween ones or even some of the other series.
customer_reviews.author: cooperkid953

customer_reviews.title: which is perfect because I promised sis she could have some as ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY soft which I didn't expect. I bought 5 and got two alike, which is perfect because I promised sis she could have some as well. In truth she uses them as a stress relief some from what I seen gently squeezing or playing with using her fingers. I am starting to see what she does in these Pusheen now <3.
customer_reviews.author: Alexina

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I got both the ones I was hoping for the first time!!! I got the ghost a year ago and got the pumpkin today! They're so cute I wouldnt have minded the mummy or Frankenstein either though I I love them all ♡ I like how every single one is adorable so even if you don't get the one you wanted most you still get a really cute one. I've been wearing my ghosty boi on my purse for so long I thought he could use a buddy and im not disappinted at all!! No regrets. Might even try to collect them all:)
customer_reviews.author: Keeley

customer_reviews.title: A super cute and super soft plush!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this. The plush is very well made and super soft. I love both cats and Halloween so this worked out perfectly. My co-workers saw this on my purse zipper and loved it. So much so that they bought one for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and it's worth it to buy here cheaper than in the store. However, they're a lot smaller than I anticipated. No worries, because they make up for it in quality and cuteness!
customer_reviews.author: Gavriela

customer_reviews.title: Duplicates
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Pusheen lover and these are super cute, I also love Halloween so I was pretty excited about these. These are very soft and they’re palm sized. I am disappointed though, I ordered two and both are the same. I would buy another but they’re too pricey to risk getting more duplicates.
customer_reviews.author: LustOfAlchemy

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, we got the ghost Pusheen. I feel like they know what's in these and sell them accordingly. The plush is cute and well made, it's just a bummer that it appears to have less of a chance of variance than if you were to buy it straight out of the case in a store.
customer_reviews.author: amigcoffee

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh they are just so adorable!! Size is small but cute! And I got Witch Stormy which is what I was hoping to get.
customer_reviews.author: Kat'sCloset12

customer_reviews.title: Fun in a box!
customer_reviews.text: I love Pusheen and Halloween so this little gift for myself is perfect. Loved the keychain I got!! I received a surprise mummy Pusheen and it's so cute, perfect to hang in my car. I will be ordering another one for my mom and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These tiny plushes are overpriced for the size but they are so adorably cute it won't matter to the committed fan/collector. They are well made and detailed. I got the little bat and am hoping to get the pumpkin next. Or the Frankenzombie. Whichever.
customer_reviews.author: lyonhaerte

customer_reviews.title: GUND Pusheen Surprise Series #4 Halloween
customer_reviews.text: My youngest daughter is obsessed with these I think she currently has over 30 of them. I really liked the different holiday themed ones and they are very cute and plushy. I would not carry one around on my keychain but they are good quality. My daughter does have a couple attached to her backpack zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: The Boxes were already opened....
customer_reviews.text: These are SUPER cute and i love them. I bought 1 for me and 2 more for 2 other friends. When i opened the box the three boxes were all already opened and so were the little bags inside. So there was no surprise when i gifted them... kind of weird.
customer_reviews.author: Ana g

customer_reviews.title: Duplicates high possibility
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 last year and one this year... All 3 are the candy corn kitty... They are cute, super soft, and seem to be made well for such a tiny stuffed animal... Id have given 5 stars if I could just get a different one... I love Halloween, so any of them would be great
customer_reviews.author: Choruk Diryc

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my daughter's birthday and she loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's birthday and she loved it. The surprise of not knowing which one you'll get makes it more fun. These tiny Pusheens are very cute. She got the mummy and she put it on her purse right away.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little pusheen surprises, but the chains are pretty cheap
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these, but be careful: they come with a flimsy little chain so you can hang them on your backpack or whatever, but you’ll probably lose your pusheen within a week if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Silea

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute pusheen. Soft little stuffed animal with a key chain. Only thing the keychain could be better they are always falling off!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, well made, soft
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with Halloween so we got this for his Christmas stocking and he loves it. Super soft, well made, and very cute. We got the ghost and he plays with it often.
customer_reviews.author: KarinaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Love Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. I didn't get the one I wanted, but it's still fun to be surprised. I had Pusheen as an accessory on my phone for Halloween. Very durable, soft, and well made. I will be continuing to buy Pusheen items.
customer_reviews.author: babybearhugs

customer_reviews.title: they are cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my nieces for Halloween, and they thought it was very cute. One got the mummy and she loves it. The other one was just holding a pumpkin, which is not as exciting, but it is still cute.
customer_reviews.author: lan811

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: All three were the same. If you pull then from same box this won't happen. I suggest not purchasing from this supplier
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that I got two of the same but that ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that I got two of the same but that happening isn't impossible. These will fit in the palm of your hand, if you want an approximate size.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Mazanek

customer_reviews.title: Gund Pusheen Surprise Halloween Plush Keychain
customer_reviews.text: The mysterious surprise element of these blind boxes is kind of irresistible particularly when the eight possible keychains are all so cute. Each sealed box is approximately 2 3/4 inches square so the one plush contained inside is quite small. There are seven possible Pusheen and one possible Stormy plush varieties which are adorable on their own but using one as a special treat for Halloween is also a good option instead of or with a reduced amount of candy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: When I received the item it was already opened to see which one it was and then resealed and resold. Very upset that j was basically scammed out of my money
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Bre

customer_reviews.title: HALLOWEEN CUTENESS! 🎃💖
customer_reviews.text: So cute!!!! Amazing little pusheen in each box! Little key chain at the top, but is also removable! I got the candy corn and pusheen pumpkin... they go awesome with my collection. Find me on instagram for more cuteness: @kraftykacen ✨🎃💖
customer_reviews.author: Madz Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cute little plushies
customer_reviews.text: I love Pusheen, the Halloween costumes are cute and the plushies are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: megan warren

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect for those who love pusheen and halloween alike
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these keychains and I cant stress enough how cute these things are! I was hoping for both of the pumpkin ones and I got what I wished for! They're wicked soft and adorable to look at and is a more than welcome addition to my keychain. Would absolutely reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Joseph jasper

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Thing Ever
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Pusheen?! I got this one on a great sale and it was the one I wanted most, the bat! It's adorable and well made. Need them all!
customer_reviews.author: Boofrickityhoo

customer_reviews.title: Adorable surprise
customer_reviews.text: Well, I’ll admit I got exactly the one I had hoped to get - so I’m extra happy with my purchase! The little plush keychain is just the right size and very sweet and extra soft.
customer_reviews.author: E. Carnes

customer_reviews.title: ... which is the one I wanted so I got super lucky! These boxes are amazing and super cute
customer_reviews.text: I got the bat pusheen which is the one I wanted so I got super lucky! These boxes are amazing and super cute! Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute...
customer_reviews.text: Got the pumpkin! Very cute! Great addition to my daughters Pusheen collection.
customer_reviews.author: FESH

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a friend. She adored it. It's small and you can use it on a keychain. Very soft. She got the ghost one. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Tuten

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest things I've ever seen. Got them as a gift and ordered a few more because I love them so much. Hopefully I get some different designs! They are so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: pusheen
customer_reviews.text: daughter got one of these as halloween is her favorite holiday. she loves the witch stormy she got. super cute, great fun size.
customer_reviews.author: DEM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most adorable thing!!! I love the surprise. I got the bat 🖤 planning on getting more
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I Love this buy me another one soon. I got the ghost👻
customer_reviews.author: P. Velez

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pusheen Halloween plushies!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got my Ghostie Pusheen!!!Yay!! I have bought many just waiting for Ghost! Thanks, I Love these, and they arrived in perfect condition! ! :D
customer_reviews.author: PriscillaHalo68

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My children and I love Pusheen (and Halloween) and these surprise boxes are always a fun thing to do together.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Elliott

customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying 6 and a I got some repeats but In the end I do love them :)
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I love my Frankenpusheen!
customer_reviews.text: I got the "Zombie Pusheen," or as I call her, Frankenpusheen! She is soft, squishy, and lovely. I've gotten so many compliments on her. I highly recommend getting one of these for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I received two very cute and different Pusheen Surprises, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Siren's Song

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love Pusheen! I got the ghost one and even though it wasn’t the one that I was hoping for, it’s so cute and soft. I’m tempted to buy more
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than in stores!
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable. High quality I have come to expect from GUND.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Nichole

customer_reviews.title: The box was in VERY good condition, the pusheen themselves are adorable and cute
customer_reviews.text: The box was in VERY good condition, the pusheen themselves are adorable and cute. Look very good on backpacks and are a nice little companion to have around :) I recommend this to pusheen lovers.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: So adorable, perfect little plush, and luckily we got the one we wanted!

customer_reviews.title: We love these little Halloween critters ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we hoped it’d be - Pusheen blind box! We love these little Halloween critters ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cute, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got the Pusheen that is popping out of a jack-o-lantern. It is so cute! And very well made. This is a great quality plush and the details are perfect. Even after Halloween has passed I still have my pusheen hanging on my backpack
customer_reviews.author: PollyPocket

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two (2) and hoped like hell I didn’t get a double but nope! I got two different ones! Thanks!

customer_reviews.text: Got all unique Pusheens from this pack. I place them everywhere for Halloween.

customer_reviews.title: two ghosts omfg YES
customer_reviews.text: i think the ghost, the bat and the zombie are the cutest. i got two ghosts. very content

customer_reviews.title: Love them even tho for repeats!

customer_reviews.title: Good party favors
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars but the price is a bit high. I ordered 3 and 2 were the same, but very cute and soft. Good party favors.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this plush keychain. I got the mystery Pusheen!! I would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Fun

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE these little Halloween Pusheens! I ordered three; I got the Ghost Pusheen, the Pusheen in a Jack-o-lantern and the Pusheen holding a pumpkin. They're all adorable and I need more!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice detail and colors

customer_reviews.title: Cute but price keeps increasing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these! I bought at least five over the course of two weeks! It’s just a sane that the price keeps going up. I bought them at 6.49 and now they’re 7.20 :/

customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 and unfortunately received 2 of the same type. That is the nature of the blind box toys however, and we weren't upset.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!

customer_reviews.title: Precious lil baby 'sheen
customer_reviews.text: Firstly I'd like to announce that I got the bat. Of all of the things I could get, I got the bat. Which is amazing to me, because my name is Bat. I just thought that was too perfect. Anyway, it's adorable! It's a lovely little creature and I'm going to continue to buy these until I get them all. They're so cute, so soft, and great quality. I hung mine from my cane.

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!!! might even buy again!

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I love them! I want them all!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but some are poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Considering how small these are for $10, I would expect them to be a better quality. I don't mind that it's small, but I got 2 pumpkins and on one, the arm and whiskers on the right side are terribly off center. Of course I ordered 3, and get two of the same, and both styles were the ones that I wanted least, but that's the gamble with these boxes. I would pay a couple bucks more to be able to buy the one(s) that I want the most.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Really cute! It says in the description you will ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! It says in the description you will receive the ghost pusheen and that is exactly what I got! It's small enough that for a backpack keychain or car keys. It's a little smaller than a Pom Pom and just the cutest thing!
customer_reviews.author: Ileene Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen collector approved!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from an individual who is a die hard Pusheen fan (I'd say Pusheen obsessed) & a hard core Halloween enthusiast, I'd say these are the cutest blind box figures ever! Incredibly soft, just like the 6" & 12" plushes. They can be used as basically anything along the lines of a toy, décor, ornament, or a key ring/key chain (as they do have a ball and chain fixture as opposed to their Christmas counter parties that had a sort of awkward silver ribbon.) Incredibly detailed & just so much fun to unbox!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great
customer_reviews.text: The plushes are cute and soft but I was very disappointed to order a couple of them and have them all be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cutest thing ever. Although a little pricy. Bought 5 of them and only got one repeat :D

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 4 are the same Pusheen

customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Adorable

customer_reviews.title: Cute Halloween Plush
customer_reviews.text: This surprise plush shipped quickly and is well made. It is a small but solid little plush with a Halloween theme. It comes with a chain to attach to a bag or keychain, if you wish.

customer_reviews.title: An adorable pusheen to clip to your bag
customer_reviews.text: An adorable pusheen to clip to your bag. I got the one sitting inside the jack-o-lantern, and even though I had that one already, it's still cute. A good gift for a cat-lover if you get a double searching for ghost pusheen like me.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

product_meta.title: GUND Pusheen Surprise Series #4 Halloween Stuffed Animal Cat Plush, 2.75"
product_meta.description: Gund is proud to present surprise plush — our very first series of plush blind boxes. Pusheen surprise plush series #4: halloween features the adorable Kitty cat sensation (and stormy!) all dressed up for halloween! each box includes a sealed Mylar bag containing a Randomized 2.75" keychain plush in one of eight formats: 1. Pusheen bat 2. Pusheen candy corn 3. Pusheen Mummy, 4. Pusheen Ghost, 5. Pusheen Zombie, 6. Pusheen sitting in pumpkin, 7. Pusheen holding pumpkin, 8. Stormy witch. Surface-washable for easy cleaning. Appropriate for ages 8+. Gund: for more than 100 years, Gund has been a premier plush Company recognized worldwide for quality innovative products. Building upon our award-winning and beloved plush designs, we continue to practice innovation by constantly developing new original and licensed designs to appeal to the next generation of customers. To that end, each one of our plush toys is constructed from premium materials for unparalleled softness and huggability. Please note: due to the collectible nature of this product, we can only accept returns for items with the sealed Mylar bag intact.
feature_bullets: Pusheen Surprise Plush Series #4: Tricks and Treats
Please note: Returns accepted only for items with sealed Mylar bag intact
